targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.host == "${server}" and 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "uptime")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and 
    r._measurement == "processes" and
    r._field == "zombies")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and 
    r._measurement == "processes" and
    r._field == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and 
    r._measurement == "processes" and
    r._field == "total_threads")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn : (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn : (r) => r._field == "usage_user" or r._field == "usage_system")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and 
    r._measurement == "mem" and
    r._field == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and 
    r._measurement == "disk" and
    r._field == "used_percent" and
    r.path == "/")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn : (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r.cpu == "cpu-total" and
    (r._field == "usage_iowait"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn : (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn : (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: ["usage_user", "usage_system", "usage_softirq", "usage_steal", "usage_nice", "usage_irq", "usage_iowait", "usage_guest", "usage_guest_nice"]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "processes" and contains(value: r._field, set: ["running", "blocked", "sleeping", "stopped", "zombies", "paging", "unknown"]) )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "mem" and contains(value: r._field, set: ["total", "used", "cached", "free", "buffered"]) )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "kernel" and r._field == "context_switches" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "kernel" and r._field == "processes_forked" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "interrupts" and r._field == "total")
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn : (r) =>
    r.host == "${server}" and
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r.cpu == "${cpu}")
  |> filter(fn : (r) => r._field =~ /usage_.*/ and r._field != "usage_idle" )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "tcp_estabresets" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "tcp_outrsts" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "tcp_activeopens" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "tcp_passiveopens" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtTCPAbortOnClose" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtTCPAbortOnData" )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtTCPAbortOnTimeout" )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtTCPAbortFailed" )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtTCPAbortOnLinger" )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtTCPAbortOnMemory" )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtSyncookiesFailed" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtSyncookiesRecv" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "TcpExtSyncookiesSent" )

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "IcmpInEchos" )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "IcmpOutEchos" )

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "IcmpOutEchoReps" )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "IpInDiscards" )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "nstat" and r._field == "Ip6InUnknownProtos" )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field =~ /udp_.*datagrams/ )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.interface == "${netif}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "bytes_recv" )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.interface == "${netif}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "drop_out" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.interface == "${netif}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "err_in" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.interface == "${netif}" and r._measurement == "net" and r._field == "err_out" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "swap" and contains(value: r._field, set: ["in", "out"] ) )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r._measurement == "swap" and contains(value: r._field, set: ["used", "total"] ))
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.name == "${disk}" and r._measurement == "diskio" and r._field == "reads" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.name == "${disk}" and r._measurement == "diskio" and r._field == "writes" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.name == "${disk}" and r._measurement == "diskio" and r._field == "read_bytes" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.name == "${disk}" and r._measurement == "diskio" and r._field == "write_bytes" )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.name == "${disk}" and r._measurement == "diskio" and r._field == "read_time" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}" and r.name == "${disk}" and r._measurement == "diskio" and r._field == "write_time" )
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "internal_agent" and r._field == "gather_errors" )
  |> derivative()

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "host",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "host",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "path",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "disk",
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "path",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "disk",
    start: -1d
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "cpu",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "cpu",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "name",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio" and r.name =~ /[a-z]d[\D]$/,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "name",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio" and r.name =~ /[a-z]d[\D]$/,
    start: -1d
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "interface",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "net",
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Network interface
list.name: netif
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "interface",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "net",
    start: -1d
)
